title: Thai Die
description: The USA Today bestselling Needlecraft mystery series returns to pick up another deadly stitchï¿½includes a free needlepoint pattern! As full-time owner of the Crewel World needlework shop and part-time sleuth, Betsy Devonshire has become skilled at weaving suspicious threads. But when one of her regulars unwittingly becomes involved in a deadly delivery of exotic antiquities, Betsy fears something is seriously warped.
author: Monica Ferris
